name: Delivery Kid
description:
Deliver the parcels to the customer's homes by throwing them to the door mat or mailbox. Avoid the obstacles such as cars, fire hydrants, skateboarders, fences, and animals. Make it to the end of the route to proceed to the next day!

Throw the newspapers at the light blue delivery areas. If you miss a delivery then you will lose that customer. Hitting an obstacle will result in the loss of one life. You will be fired after losing all of your lives. Break windows and garbage cans for bonus breakage score. Successfully deliver to all houses and you will gain a new subscriber. Complete the game by making deliveries through Sunday.
